information_research_and_summarization.task_description: Find the top-rated fitness apps with a free trial and summarize their features in Notes.
Compile a list of trending books on TikTok and Instagram and summarize reviews in Notes.
Find the weather forecast for the next week and create a summary with recommendations for outdoor activities.
Research upcoming tech conferences in my area and create a list with registration deadlines.
Check news about space exploration and compile the most exciting updates.
Find YouTube tutorials on improving time management and summarize their key points.
Locate and summarize articles about sustainable travel tips.
Find popular investment strategies on Google and summarize the findings.
Discover recent fashion trends on Lemon8 and summarize them in Notes.
Research the history of the Eiffel Tower and create a detailed summary.

routine_management.task_description: Organize my contacts by adding missing details like emails and birthdays from Gmail.
Review my calendar and suggest times for breaks based on meeting density.
Check my Google Maps history and suggest the most efficient routes for daily commutes.
Set reminders for upcoming subscription renewals based on emails.
Create a weekly task list based on recurring habits and meetings.
Identify emails with attachments and organize them into folders based on the file type.
Find and delete duplicate contacts in my phone book.
Summarize the past monthâ€™s events from my calendar and notes.
Backup all my Notes to Google Drive.

online_shopping_and_deal_hunting.task_description: Find the best deals on noise-canceling headphones on Amazon, Best Buy, and Walmart.
Track the price drop for a PlayStation 5 across shopping apps and notify me.
Check reviews for the latest smartwatches on Amazon and summarize pros and cons.
Compare bulk grocery prices across Amazon and Walmart and create a shopping list.
Find ongoing sales and discounts on outdoor camping gear.
Search for flight deals for a vacation to Hawaii in the next three months.
Locate limited-time offers on electronics from newsletters and summarize them.
Find the best-reviewed robot vacuum under $300 on Amazon and summarize comparisons.
Search for eco-friendly gift options under $50 and suggest the top three.
Compare student discounts on laptops from Walmart, Best Buy, and Amazon.

entertainment_and_recreation.task_description: Suggest the top 10 trending YouTube channels for tech enthusiasts.
Find Instagram posts of popular weekend getaways near my city and summarize the best options.
Plan a virtual movie night by finding movies available on YouTube and creating a schedule.
Search for hiking trails nearby using Maps and compile a list with difficulty levels.
Find trending dance challenges on TikTok and suggest tutorials to participate.
Discover live music events happening this month and add them to my calendar.
Summarize the best holiday travel destinations based on blogs on REDnote.
Check for trending DIY art projects on Lemon8 and make a list of supplies needed.
Find reviews of upcoming theater plays in my area and recommend the best ones.
Locate the best-reviewed cafes for live jazz in my city and create a list.
